Eigen Property¶

class EigenProperty.EigenProperty(dataset, **kwargs)[source]¶

Property that holds eigen propoerties (e.g., eigen vectors, eigen values)

Attributes

Points Holds the points dataset
Raster Holds raster dataset
Size Return the size of the property
eigenValues
eigenVectors

Methods

getValues() Get a specific characteristic value of the property
save(filename, **kwargs) Save the property in either json or hdf5.
setValues(**kwargs) Sets eigen values and eigen vectors into the EigenProperty object
eigenValues¶
eigenVectors¶
getValues()[source]¶

Get a specific characteristic value of the property

Returns: value for each point
Return type: np.array
setValues(**kwargs)[source]¶

Sets eigen values and eigen vectors into the EigenProperty object

Parameters:
  • eigenValues (np.array) – if two nd-arrays were sent for raster data. np.array([minVals, maxVals])
  • eigenVectors (np.array) –
